title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 02
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: But, by my faith, it's as teuch a job as boilin' auld Soulisin the cauldron at the Skelfhill; and I hae nae black spae-book likeThomas to help my spell.
